VST 3 Examples  VST 3.7
SDK for developing VST plug-in
 

- b -

  • b0a0 : Filter
  • b1a0 : Filter
  • b2a0 : Filter
  • band : SpecMeterProcessor
  • bBypass : AGain , Plug
  • bHalfGain : AGain
  • bias : ComboProcessor
  • bits : DitherProcessor
  • bold : TrackerProcessor
  • buf : DetuneProcessor , RePsychoProcessor
  • buf0 : DegradeProcessor , RezFilterProcessor , SplitterProcessor , TalkBoxProcessor
  • buf1 : AmbienceProcessor , DegradeProcessor , RezFilterProcessor , ShepardProcessor , SplitterProcessor , TalkBoxProcessor , TrackerProcessor
  • buf2 : AmbienceProcessor , DegradeProcessor , RePsychoProcessor , RezFilterProcessor , ShepardProcessor , SplitterProcessor , TrackerProcessor
  • buf3 : AmbienceProcessor , DegradeProcessor , SplitterProcessor , TrackerProcessor
  • buf4 : AmbienceProcessor , DegradeProcessor , TrackerProcessor
  • buf5 : DegradeProcessor
  • buf6 : DegradeProcessor
  • buf7 : DegradeProcessor
  • buf8 : DegradeProcessor
  • buf9 : DegradeProcessor
  • buffe2 : ComboProcessor
  • buffer : ComboProcessor , DelayProcessor , DubDelayProcessor , RePsychoProcessor , StereoProcessor , ThruZeroProcessor , BrownNoise< SamplePrecision >
  • buffer2 : RePsychoProcessor , ThruZeroProcessor
  • bufferSize : BrownNoise< SamplePrecision >
  • bufl : RezFilterProcessor
  • buflen : DetuneProcessor
  • bufpos : ComboProcessor , StereoProcessor , ThruZeroProcessor
  • bufres : DetuneProcessor
  • bypassBuffer0 : Processor

  • bypassSNA : GlobalParameterState
